(NOT POSSIBLE TO CHANGE)

B2 arranged or decided already and not able to be changed: a fixed price fixed interest rates Is the date of the wedding fixed yet?

fixed adjective
(NOT MOVING)
not moving or able to be moved from its position: Guide stars are fixed points in space used to keep a telescope in position. It can help your balance if you keep your eyes on a fixed object.
(of a look or someone's eyes) not moving from a particular point: She frightened her younger siblings with a fixed stare.fixed on His eyes were completely fixed on the food.
